snippet: With expansion in factory activity, India remains a bright spot among Asian economies.
abstract: With expansion in factory activity, India remains a bright spot among Asian economies.
lead_paragraph: “The Chinese economy picked up in November, but a broader global recovery remains fragile and patchy, a clutch of factory surveys suggested Monday, with activity elsewhere in Asia remaining largely subdued and demand from Europe and the United States depressed,” a Reuters report said.

headline.main: Mixed Signs of Recovery for Asian Economies
